unnormalised: **Home Loan Schemes Spice Up This Festive Season!**
normalised: **Home Loan Schemes Spice Up This Festive Season!**

unnormalised: Diwali is just around the corner, and guess what? Home loan schemes are raining offers like it’s the season of free mithai! Banks like HDFC and SBI are pulling out all the stops to get you into your dream home before you can say “Shubh Deepavali!”
normalised: Diwali is just around the corner, and guess what? Home loan schemes are raining offers like it's the season of free mithai! Banks like H D F C and S B I are pulling out all the stops to get you into your dream home before you can say "Shubh Deepavali!"

unnormalised: Interest rates are dropping faster than a celebrity's social media apology. We're talking rates as low as 8.5% for eligible borrowers. Plus, some lenders are waiving processing fees - saving you a sweet chunk of change, maybe enough to buy a lifetime supply of Biryani!
normalised: Interest rates are dropping faster than a celebrity's social media apology. We're talking rates as low as eight point five percent for eligible borrowers. Plus, some lenders are waiving processing fees - saving you a sweet chunk of change, maybe enough to buy a lifetime supply of Biryani!

unnormalised: Several new schemes target first-time homebuyers, especially those in Tier 2 and Tier 3 cities like Lucknow and Kochi. Think lower EMIs and extended repayment periods – making that 2BHK in Indiranagar a whole lot more achievable.
normalised: Several new schemes target first-time homebuyers, especially those in Tier two and Tier three cities like Lucknow and Kochi. Think lower E M I s and extended repayment periods – making that two B H K in Indiranagar a whole lot more achievable.

unnormalised: Don't forget to compare offers! Check the fine print, folks. Pre-payment penalties can be a real bummer later on.
normalised: Don't forget to compare offers! Check the fine print, folks. Pre-payment penalties can be a real bummer later on.

unnormalised: Experts recommend having a solid credit score (750+) and a down payment ready.
normalised: Experts recommend having a solid credit score (seven hundred and fifty plus) and a down payment ready.

unnormalised: So, ditch the firecrackers this year (maybe) and invest in something more lasting! Happy house hunting, and Happy Diwali!
normalised: So, ditch the firecrackers this year (maybe) and invest in something more lasting! Happy house hunting, and Happy Diwali!
